title: Script
content:
Can you please help me identify these typefaces found in the following blog: [http://advancedstyle.blogspot.ca/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123724/http:/advancedstyle.blogspot.ca/ "http://advancedstyle.blogspot.ca/") ? Thanks.

Font: 

 Burgues Script 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123724/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [AriCohenAdvancedStyle-04copy2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123724/http:/typophile.com/files/AriCohenAdvancedStyle-04copy2.jpg) | 107.23 KB |
author: Deedot

comments.content: "ADVANCED" must be **[Futura Light](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123724/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Futura%20LT%20Light%20-%20Regular&fid=6daaeacf369f5c15f3308f379ab05b77&fsize=60&text=ADVANCED&wrap=2)** while the script looks like **[Burgues Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317123724/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/burgues-script/)** by Alejandro Paul [2011, Sudtipos]
